nodes.bodyText: I am not able to reproduce the case that a region must be provided for STS client, please let me know if there is a way to reproduce the scenario.
I wouldn't worry about it then.  We have a rather complicated account setup and I'm not sure I know well enough what is producing the issue internally for us.
you should add a finally to retry to drop the namespace.
This file does not exist, I call inputFile.exsits() just to check it has access permission.
